cache_event

Event manager for simple cache module from Erlang and OTP in Action.

Event manager for simple cache module from Erlang and OTP in Action

Functions

start_link() -> ok

Start cache event

add_handler(Handler::handler() (see module gen_event), Args::term()) -> term()

Add handler

delete_handler(Handler::handler() (see module gen_event), Args::term()) -> term()

Delete handler

lookup(Key::term()) -> ok

Notify about looking up a Key in cache

create(Key::term(), Value::term()) -> ok

Notify about creating pair {Key, Value} in cache

replace(Key::term(), Value::term()) -> ok

Notify about replacing Value part of pair {Key, '_'} in cache

delete(Key::term()) -> ok

Notify about deleting from cache
